title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Media twisting themselves in knots trying to cover up Democrat lies. Biden's human trafficking crisis. John Kerry's hypocrisy, election investigations ignored by media. Democrats struggling to reopen states because of union resistance. CDC can't figure out guidance on masks. Rush predicted that Biden and the Democrats would follow the "science" they corrupted and politicized to keep restrictions in place as long as possible. Pete Hegseth says masks are the MAGA hats of the left. Rush was way ahead of the curve on liberal virtue signaling with his ribbon bit on his TV show. NYT, WaPo, NBC retract false Rudy stories. Rush on how media used false stories based on anonymous stories to smear President Trump. Caller who played a doctor on Miami Vice. Ken on James' Golden's new podcast: Rush Limbaugh, the Man Behind the Golden EIB Microphone.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Leftist narratives are garbage. Human trafficking boat crashes in San Diego. Border crisis. Rush on the Kate Steinle verdict in San Francisco: Democrats care more about illegal alien criminals than law-abiding American citizen. Joey Dementia and the border crisis. New York caller on the tyranny of Cuomo and Democrat absurdity on masks. IRS data from last year proves what Rush told us: Democrats are now the party of the rich. Barrasso and Cassidy on the Democrat spending proposals.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

CBS poll: 85% approved of Biden's ridiculous speech to Congress. Rush on conservatives losing the branding war with socialist Democrats. Chicago pastor calls in. Democrats redefine and corrupt the language. Nighttime splashdown for NASA is first since 1968. Rush on his awe and fascination for space exploration and technology. James Golden podcast on Rush.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
